vision: A visual control system for recursive UI testing where the AI autonomously discovers surfaces and humans monitor omissions.

ultimate_requirements.title: Autonomous UI Surface Mapping
ultimate_requirements.description: AI must scan the codebase and identify all interactive elements, including hidden states (modals, tooltips).

ultimate_requirements.title: State Transition Matrix
ultimate_requirements.description: Exhaustively test all combinations of valid and invalid state transitions (e.g., clicking 'Pay' while 'Loading').

ultimate_requirements.title: Fog of War Visualization
ultimate_requirements.description: The dashboard must display untested areas as 'Dark Zones' which clear up as the AI confirms coverage.
